items.sentence: I learned to drive a car and got a driver\'s license when I was eighteen.
It didn\'t surprise me at all that Tom got arrested from drunken driving.
The teacher told Tom that he couldn\'t give him anything higher than a C.
Tom and Mary often text each other, even when they\'re in the same house.
Tom bought a camera just a couple of days ago, but he\'s already lost it.
Tom is over thirty, but he\'s still financially dependent on his parents.
Tom\'s divorce from Mary reportedly cost him more than a million dollars.
Try not to spend so much time complaining about things you can\'t change.
We can either go to the beach or go mountain climbing. We can\'t do both.
Tom is the only American Mary knows whose father wasn\'t born in America.
